r.d: This extension allows you to access Oracle databases. It can be built with PHP 4.3.9 to 5.x. It can be linked with Oracle 9.2, 10.2, 11.1, or 11.2 client libraries.
r.n: Fixed bug #63307 (Unused variable in oci8.c) Fixed bug #63265 (Add ORA-00028 to the PHP_OCI_HANDLE_ERROR macro) Fixed bug #60901 (Improve "tail" syntax for AIX installation)
